name: Sweet Corn Cocktail
description: I took inspiration from one of my favorite ways to eat corn, Mexican corn on the cob or elote—grilled and topped with lime juice and spices. The resulting cocktail is the color of corn—a light, milky yellow—with flavor that manages to be both bold and bright.
recipeIngredient: 3 drops mole bitters, like Bitterman's Xocolatl Mole Bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle the corn in the bottom of a cocktail shaker until the kernels are mashed and a milky liquid forms.
Add the lime juice, demerara syrup, rum and bitters. Fill shaker with ice and shake for about 10 seconds.
Using both the cocktail strainer and a fine mesh strainer, strain the cocktail into a glass.
